Title: Minnesota governor slams ‘another horrific shooting’ by federal agents
Summary: Unconfirmed video circulating of a person who appears to have been shot during a street disturbance . Several gunshots heard and at least one person in the vicinity wearing a vest marked "POLICE" Minnesota governor slams ‘another horrific shooting’ by federal agents .

Title: EPL: Spurs slip at Burnley increases pressure on Frank as City win
Summary: Tottenham dropped more points in a 2-2 draw at relegation-threatened Burnley on Saturday . Manchester City cut the gap to Premier League leaders Arsenal to four points .

Title: Augsburg hand Bayern Munich first Bundesliga defeat since March
Summary: Hiroki Ito's opener gave the defending champions an early lead . But Augsburg fought back with two goals in six second-half minutes from Arthur Chaves and Han-Noah Massengo .

Title: NATO wants ‘automated’ defences along borders with Russia
Summary: NATO is moving to boost its defences along European borders with Russia . AI-assisted "automated zone" not reliant on human ground forces .

Title: Awujale: Ogun dismisses rumour of suspending Ijebu chiefs
Summary: Those mentioned in the viral report include the Kakanfo of Ijebu land, Chief Abimbola Okenla . The Lapoekun and Madasa are also mentioned . Chief Tunde Odulaja and Chief Lekan Oshifeso are said to have been suspended .

Title: Tonto Dikeh reflects on marriage to Churchill 10 years after split
Summary: Nollywood actress Tonto Dikeh has taken to social media to reflect on her marriage with ex-husband Olakunle Churchill, ten years after their separation . In a lengthy post on her Instagram page on Saturday, she thanked God for His unfailing love and for completing what He starts . She also expressed gratitude to Churchill for

Title: Bandits kill six in Niger community, two missing
Summary: The Niger State Police Command confirmed that six villagers were killed by suspected bandits in Wawa community, Borgu Local Government Area . The attack occurred on Thursday when a father, identified as Deshi, and his son went to visit workers on their farm . The son narrowly escaped and alerted villagers, prompting local vigilante groups to mobilise in search

Title: Police nab 22-year-old woman with 89 sachets of tramadol in Borno
Summary: Borno State Police Command has arrested a 22-year-old woman for allegedly smuggling tramadol concealed in a sack of grounded maize . The Commissioner of Police, Naziru Abdulmajid, disclosed this in a statement shared via X.com and signed by the command’s Public Relations Officer, ASP Nahum Kenneth Das

Title: Oluremi Tinubu to deliver keynote at teachers’ summit 2026
Summary: The Nigeria Teachers’ Summit 2026 is scheduled to hold from January 27 to 28 . The event is part of efforts to reposition teachers at the centre of education reform . The First Lady of Nigeria, Oluremi Tinubu, is expected to deliver the keynote address .

Title: Army foils bandit attack, kills suspected terrorist in Kaduna
Summary: Troops of 1 Division, Sector 1 Operation FANSAN YAMMA have successfully foiled a bandit attack in Maraban Rido general area of Kaduna State . The operation followed a distress call received late on January 22, 2026, reporting armed bandits had rustled livestock in Anguwan Fulan village . Troops
